Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Variations sur un thème de M’lle Egoroff, WoO 9

1887

[IMSLP]

The theme is followed by three variations.

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · III/12 · Works of various genres without opus number / Unfinished works · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Könemann · K 262 · Individual Pieces · ed. Victor Ekimovsky

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 4
